data.caption: Clarification Sought From Sanghvi Movers Ltd
data.news_body:
The Exchange has sought clarification from Sanghvi Movers Ltd on April 22 2025 with reference to significant movement in price in order to ensure that investors have latest relevant information about the company and to inform the market so that the interest of the investors is safeguarded.

The reply is awaited.
